types.description: Inter-Processor Messaging boolean writer. Writes a boolean packet with a given ID to a different core.
types.name: ipm/boolean-writer

members.description: ID of message. Readers will use this ID to receive messages. Must be greater than 0 and smaller than platform maximum id number.
members.name: id

in_ports.description: Boolean packets sent here will be sent to another core.
in_ports.name: IN

out_ports.description: Packet sent after remote side consumed sent packet.
out_ports.name: CONSUMED

types.description: Inter-Processor Messaging boolean reader. Reads a boolean packet with a given ID from a different core.
types.name: ipm/boolean-reader

members.description: ID of message. Only messages written with this ID will be received. Must be greater than 0 and smaller than platform maximum id number.
members.name: id

out_ports.description: Boolean packets read from different core will be sent here.
out_ports.name: OUT
